property.name: Card Text
property.value: While Board of Trustees is ready, Student characters gain Willpower. While Board of Trustees is exhausted, Faculty characters gain Toughness +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story at which Whitton Greene is committed, search your deck for a Tome support card and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Richard Pike is made insane, all other { characters gain Willpower and Toughness +1 until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Explorer characters gain Willpower. Disrupt: When an Explorer character you control would leave play, draw 2 cards or put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Explorer characters gain Toughness +1. Resolve story struggles in the order of your choice for the story card at which an Explorer character you control is committed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot have Attachment cards attached. Response: After Doctor Bancroft is wounded, pay 1 to choose a character. Place X wound tokens on that character. X is equal to the number of wound tokens on Doctor Bancroft.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Explorer characters get +1 skill. Response: After a character enters or leaves play from a card effect and you control a { card, put Matthew Alexander into play from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Explorer characters gain Fast. Response: After an Explorer character you control enters play and any opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw 3 cards. Then choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a player would play a non-Location support card, discard one of your success tokens from a story to instead put that card into play under your control, as if you had just played it from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When you would lose a struggle, ready Maurice Diggs to choose 1 success token at any story on any player's side and move it to another story on the same side.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Exhaust Eschatologist and discard a Prophecy card from your hand to cancel a card effect just triggered.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control is made insane, drive Catacombs Docent insane to add 1 success token to a story with less than 4 success tokens on your side.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you control only { cards, Arctic Ethnologist gains a # icon and Explorer characters you control gain an $ icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While Cub Reporter is committed to a story, if he is chosen to go insane because of a @ story struggle he does not do so until all other struggles at that story are resolved.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you play Alternative Historian, draw a card. Action: Discard a card from your hand to choose an icon struggle at a story. That struggle does not resolve this phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control is destroyed, drive Ghost Hunter insane to add a success token to a story with less than 4 success tokens on your side.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The cost of the first Research card you play each turn is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 1). Action: Exhaust Overworked Graduate Student to reduce the cost of the next Student or Faculty character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a Student or Faculty character would be wounded because of a # struggle, instead wound Campus Security Guard. Disrupt: Discard Campus Security Guard from your hand to prevent a Student or Faculty character from going insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After College Prospect is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a Student character. Attached character gains Toughness +2. Action: Sacrifice attached character to choose and wound 1 character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a story card. Characters committed to this story lose all @ icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Explorer and Scientist characters you control are immune to triggered character abilities.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you win an % struggle, pay 1 to search your deck for an event card or a Tome support card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you lose an icon struggle, exhaust Mu to restore 1 character or remove 1 wound token from 1 character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a player triggers the effect on a Prophecy card, draw 1 card. Action: Exhaust Atlantis to choose a card in any player's discard pile and place it on the bottom of his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Ultima Thule to put an Explorer character into play from your hand. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, return it to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control was chosen as the only target of a triggered effect, exhaust Ipiutak to copy that effect choosing another character as the target of that effect.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to search your deck for a Prophecy event card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Response: After a player triggers a Prophecy card, exhaust Apocalyptic Visions to choose and ready any number of characters with an % icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a { character you control is destroyed, discard A Voros Hal'l Jon from the top of your deck to search your deck for 2 cards and add them to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during the story phase before any characters are committed to stories. Action: Choose a story card. Story icon struggles do not resolve at that story this phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a { character to choose a story struggle icon at a story. Replace that story struggle icon with a story struggle icon of your choice, until the end of the phase.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: "... and they shall fall to their knees..."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After you win an % struggle, discard Por V 1:20 from the top of your deck to choose 1 character. Ready or exhaust that character, if able. If you chose to exhaust that character it cannot be readied during the next refresh phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during the story phase before any characters are committed to stories. Action: Choose a story and name an icon struggle. Only that icon struggle can resolve at that story this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When one of your { characters committed to a story would be destroyed, put a { character into play from your hand, committed to the same story. Then, if that character is still in play at the end of the phase, return it to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a character you control would go insane or be wounded because of a story struggle, instead uncommit that character. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When an icon struggle would resolve at a story, choose a { character and commit it to that story. Until the end of the phase, that character gains:

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard X success tokens from 1 story to choose X cards in your discard pile and add them to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Immune to triggered effects. Response: After a Tactic card is played, ready The Claret Knight.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Aliki Zoni Uperetria exhausts to commit to a story, choose and drain 1 domain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Amaranth may commit to conspiracy cards while exhausted. Response: After you succeed at a story where Amaranth is committed, search your deck for a conspiracy card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Er'nrawr's text box cannot be blanked or treated as if it were blank. At the beginning of a player's turn, that player must wound a character he controls or drain one of his domains.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a character is wounded because of a # struggle, discard Hamu IV 1:13 from the top of your deck to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a character is sacrificed, discard Por XV 14:19 from the top of your deck to add the top 2 cards of your discard pile to 2 different domains.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a character to have each opponent sacrifice a character with a printed cost equal to or greater than the character you sacrificed. Limit once per phase.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: "The Chimes of Bedlam mark the hour."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a character is made insane, discard Hamu XX 15:14 from the top of your deck to choose up to 2 cards in your discard pile. Add those cards to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a non-Lunatic character is restored, it goes insane unless its controller pays 1.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: She will give birth to madness...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After 3 or more characters are commited to a story, discard Hanyatl's 7:13 from the top of your deck and choose 1 non-Ancient One character to go insane, ignoring Willpower or @ icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Destroy all Day cards. Forced Response: After Nug enters play, attach 1 card from the top of your deck to each of your domains as a resource.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a character is put into play through a card effect, discard Hanyatl's 1:9 from the top of your deck to destroy a support card.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The cost of non-^ characters cannot be lowered. Action: Pay 1 to choose a Spell or Ritual card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: "The horn blew and the hordes came."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Response: After a character has its skill lowered by a card effect, discard Hanyatl's 12:3 from the top of your deck to put a } character into play from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character committed to a story and reveal the top card of your deck. If the cost of the revealed card is lower than the cost of the chosen character, uncommit that character. Then, either put the revealed card on the bottom of your deck or discard it. (Limit once per story, per turn.)

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: "The secrets were written in the stars."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during any player's draw phase. Action: Place this card face up on your deck. Replace: After you win an $ struggle, discard Lev'l 15:13 from the top of your deck to choose 1 character. Give that character 2 wounds.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Umr at-Tawil readies, choose a player. That player draws 2 cards. Then, look at his hand and choose and discard two cards from it. Limit once per turn.
